00192         {
00193             return TemplateIterator (mTemplates.begin (), mTemplates.end ()) ;
00194         }
00195         /* Returns whether the Element with the given name is a Template */
00196         bool isTemplate (String strName) const {
00197             return (mTemplates.find (strName) != mTemplates.end()) ;
00198         }
